data.name: Gradient
desc: Describes a gradient between two colors.
Many aspects of the gradient are undefined, like the algorithm and color space to use to interpolate between the colors and what \"intensity\" means.

properties.name: Style
desc: specifies the style of the gradient.

properties.name: StartColor
desc: specifies the color at the start point of the gradient.

properties.name: EndColor
desc: specifies the color at the end point of the gradient.

properties.name: Angle
desc: angle of the gradient in 1/10 degree.

properties.name: Border
desc: per cent of the total width where just the start color is used.

properties.name: XOffset
desc: Specifies the X-coordinate, where the gradient begins.
This is effectively the center of the RADIAL, ELLIPTICAL, SQUARE and RECT style gradients.

properties.name: YOffset
desc: Specifies the Y-coordinate, where the gradient begins.

properties.name: StartIntensity
desc: Specifies the intensity at the start point of the gradient.

properties.name: EndIntensity
desc: specifies the intensity at the end point of the gradient.

properties.name: StepCount
desc: Specifies the number of steps of change color.
